website_summaries.verdict: Packs punch for public speakers while being quite small in stature.
pros: Amplifies well and adjusts for those who need to move around on a stage
Rechargeable battery lasts up to 15 hours
Several reviews cite the stellar clarity and range
cons: Sound may muffle when the crowd is facing away

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable Voice Amplifier!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent portable speaker! It is the second one I have purchased. I gave the first one to a friend as a gift. I use the Voice Booster to preach the gospel of Jesus Christ on the streets and on campuses. It packs alot of power and has great features. You cannot beat it for the price. The Voice Booster seems to be very durable and will give over 12 hours of use on each charge of the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: TCRay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a street preacher and this little amplifier is a powerful little unit. Big things come in small packages! His audience range across a 40' distance. The unit works best when the speaker faces the audience. If it is turned away then it begins to sound a bit muffled, but it is terrific for the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Repent or perish! Obey Jesus!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for open air preaching! Don't have to yell to be heard. Jesus is Lord!
customer_reviews.author: mandoman

customer_reviews.title: Great for Street Preaching!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent voice amplifier with awesome extra features that enable it to record or play the radio. I use it for street preaching and like it better than traditional bull-horns because it is just enough to get your voice heard, but is within most city decibel limits. The hands free feature is also really nice. If you're looking for an affordable option, this is a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Onesimus

customer_reviews.title: Rejoice street preachers!
customer_reviews.text: Rejoice street preachers! This thing is light, compact, loud, and lasts for a good amount of time (battery-wise). This will do you very well for light crowds and somewhat decent for heavy crowds (you'll at least be able to be heard in the immediate vicinity).
customer_reviews.author: Aamir Najee Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for street preaching. Battery life is great. Sound is great. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Wells

customer_reviews.title: Very little feedback and I no longer strain my voice when speaking to a group.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. I have one paralyzed vocal cord and speak softly with scratchy voice. Speaking loudly is tiring. However, I do a lot of public speaking and the Voice Booster is perfect. Very little feedback noise. I like the headphone set, but I am also looking for compatible hand-held microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great For High Vehicular Traffic Areas
customer_reviews.text: So far, not a bad acquisition. I took it to a high volume vehicular traffic area. Brooklyn, NY, Atlantic and Flatbush Avenue. I can be heard clearly with the sound echoing off the buildings with no problems. I would recommend it to anyone doing street preaching. You will be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C. Rochester

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use very comfortable to wear love this product very durable and lots of useful features.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Works great outside!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a head worn microphone as a cheap alternative for a Cox Box for our Dragon Boat which can cost in the $600-$800 range. It is plenty loud for paddlers all the way in the back of the boat (40' long) to hear the coach over the splashing of paddles, wind and wake the boat makes when 20 people are paddling at full speed. I bought a waterproof lightweight zippered travel bag to protect it from splashes and a 20' audio cable to extend the microphone from the amp. I strap it to seat 5 with a couple of bungee cords. Works great and has saved our club lots of $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Patton

customer_reviews.title: Anker Voicebooster is HIGH quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m SO amazed at the audio quality of this voice booster! Perfect for street preachers, public speakers, tour guides, protests, etc. I’ve tried numerous voice boosters and this speaker out shines all the rest! Excellent price! You will not regret buying this speaker made by Anker!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Myers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. I’ve used this several times preaching in public. This works great for small crowds where I don’t want to use my big megaphone.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel.KJBB

customer_reviews.title: Great for street preaching
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, a light, inexpensive, easy to use loudspeaker. I use it for street preaching at local events. The headset allows me to have my hands free and the sound carries far enough (across a city street) and loud enough to be effective. Other units are heavy, expensive, require a separately purchased microphone and are over-kill for my purposes and generally draw complaints from nearby vendors when the volume is too high or the speaker is too “expressive”.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: So far this voice amp is working great. I use it to street preach with and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this voice amp is working great. I use it to street preach with and now I don't have to raise my voice much like I did with my old voice amp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Clear!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing packs a lot of punch for being small! This is a great addition to our ministry!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Deeper base sound than the lesser wattage models. Sounds clear and loud.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets LOUD! Compact size. Perfect for what we want to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: L&J

customer_reviews.title: Great reliable voice amplifier
customer_reviews.text: This amp is great for open air preaching. The sound covers a fairly good area and woks great out in large crowds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The power of the sound is great and the mic is light and picks up my ...
customer_reviews.text: The power of the sound is great and the mic is light and picks up my voice well. Two cons: the weight (quite heavy) and the cylinder body (it opens and closes on its own, and hurt my finger to bleed) I am ordering a smaller one (20 watt) from the same company to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for open air preaching in festivals and on the streets. I was surprised at my first time to use it on the streets downtown when I could here my voice ricocheting off of the buildings. I recommend this to anyone who is interested in trying voice amplification to get the Gospel out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Boom
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Projects my voice as well as some amplifiers twice as large. I had a few battery and mic issues, but the manufacturer helped us out there. Still using it every week, and one charge will last for several hours. It even gets the sound through building walls when you need to. I also use it to call my children when they are out in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Koheleth

customer_reviews.title: Nice, useful product.
customer_reviews.text: It is great as far as sound. Not super loud but useful. I bought it for street preaching and did not want a "bullhorn" effect. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Bridges

customer_reviews.title: A Loud Bang for Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Great for street preaching! On one hand I wish it had the power to be a bit louder. However, on the other hand it's nice because you can be heard across the street without blasting people in front of you. The only reason for the 4-star is that it would be nice to have a lithium ion battery rather than a nickel cadium. As the instructions tell you let it run down before recharging. That wouldn't be a big deal, but there's no battery-level indicator on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: great features, decent sound
customer_reviews.text: At least for my item, great features, decent sound, poor final assembly, chipped marks all over the buttons and crooked sliding tube. I wish I could return it, or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Otero

customer_reviews.title: Good Amp, could be better
customer_reviews.text: I really like the portability, the volume and the batter life of this unit. I don't like the headset which has to be literally right next to your mouth for you to be heard. I haven't tried getting a different mic for it, but that may be an option to make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic PA
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly good product. I won't say for the money because it would be great for a lot more money. Loud, clear and very nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, it came fast !
customer_reviews.text: The Voice Booster works great! it's small and light but it puts out great sound. The pacage came very fast in the mail. It arrived faster than quoted. Thats a big plus when companies work hard to ship it right away.
customer_reviews.author: daw

customer_reviews.title: Great for street preaching.
customer_reviews.text: Im very satisfied with this voice amplifier. Loud and clear sound, i will recommened this for anyone who will go out to preach the gospel of Jesus Christ.
customer_reviews.author: Áron á Roykheyggi

customer_reviews.title: Not enough volume, feedback issues
customer_reviews.text: Do not get much volume out of this without it feeding back. Cool product if it was just a little better quality microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Stellar
customer_reviews.text: Extremely awesome speaker! This is it right here. When looking for the best small voice amplifier, this is it. I was amazed at how loud this thing gets. And at the advanced set up. It has an SD slot for mp3 playing. VERY Loud Speaker. Way way way louder than the Croove.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesotan4Life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty loud. The sound is clear. Praise God!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pugmire

customer_reviews.title: Loud, confortable, long battery life. I wish it had separate voice and music volumes.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased six of these. I am very pleased with the purchase. I use it to facilitate outdoor team building activities and It works great for groups up to 80 people. (already tried that) Indoors, in a conference room I have used it to address a group of 120 people and worked very well. In my opinion it is acoustically equalized for voice, it is actually very loud. It works ok for music, just not HiFi sound. Microphone is very confortable. For me to give it five stars will only requiere separate volumes for voice and music. If you turn off the unit and turn it back on the music on the micro SD card will start automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel (Mike) Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: A very nice product that everyone should consider if buying a voice ...
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product that everyone should consider if buying a voice booster and amplifier....the product was in a very good condition , new and nicely packed up .It was also delivered on time and in a very good condition...very easy to use and gives sweet sound .
customer_reviews.author: Artika Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT for a fitness professional!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely​ not for a fitness professional. Thought this was wireless, it is not. Mediocre sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: Effective, respectable, nice shoulder strap, good clear but non obnoxious sound. It can be heard 150" with traffic passing by.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Perfect for traveling and projecting your voice. Clear sound. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Loud.
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME product. I use it for street preaching of the GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRIST
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This the perfect tool for any open air situation. Not only does it work great for voice, but it has several options to use as a speaker to plan music.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: The amp works wonderfully, it's fairly clear, has an aux jack and an MP3 player! Just be wary of inexpensive microphones, some are definitely louder than others
customer_reviews.author: Texas Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough!
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t that loud and it kept going in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: It is well worth the money awesome sound and it took about 26 hours of continuous ...
customer_reviews.text: It is well worth the money awesome sound and it took about 26 hours of continuous use before the battery went dead. Great for open air preaching
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buckmaster

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product, pretty powerful for such a small thing. It did NOT come with the mic shown in the photos though. That was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It is nice and lightweight and works perfect for what I need. The price is very affordable too.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Works fine .Good sound quality. But very often it goes dead. (Power LED keeps on) Otherwise I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: N.R.Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Great Amplifier- Worked Perfect and Plenty Loud
customer_reviews.text: The VoiceBooster Amplifier AK-38 was awesome. It worked exactly as I needed it to and was plenty loud for my event. I hosted a 5k/10k run and everyone in the area that the run took pace was easily able to hear me. It was easy to use and I look forward to using it for more events in the future. A++
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Voice Booster
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This works great and the head-set mic is really good. I love the option to play music through a couple of great options. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hagler

customer_reviews.title: If you like tinny sound
customer_reviews.text: If you like tinny sound, screeching feedback, a trebly megaphone-like sound then this is for you. Don't even try to sing into it-- sounds horrible. But, if your looking for cheap. This is cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Doogles

customer_reviews.title: Use it on a bus
customer_reviews.text: I use this voice amp on a bus and it is loud enough that the children all the way in the back can hear - 5 star product
customer_reviews.author: M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my husband's golf cart and he loves it....
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rives

customer_reviews.title: I love the voice box I use the voice box out ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the voice box I use the voice box out doors Thank You I Will Continue To Order products
customer_reviews.author: Calvin roberson

customer_reviews.title: its a good product
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product but, If you get one realize that if you wear metal earrings there will be feedback and might give you a headache. Something to do with the electric charge. I have fillings which are metal. I don't know if it affects it or not. I think the headphone cord should be longer .
customer_reviews.author: Sandy beach

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 25 Watt Aker amp for my Darth Vader costume and am very pleased with it. The recharge feature will save me a lot in batteries and the volume power allows me to be heard in much larger venues with my Vortex 2 voice changer. I highly recommend this amp for costumers who want volume and rechargeable battery life over compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Olson

customer_reviews.title: for the teacher
customer_reviews.text: I order this item for my wife who is a teacher. The item looks promising, but upon close examination, I decide to return the item. The major design defect I see in this unit is the lack of ease when replacing batteries. I know my wife will be walking around with the item, so when the batteries die out or wear out, she will need to replace the battery quick. I can't tell from the instruction what kind of batteries it requires. I am little surprise that for an item of $90 dollars its not real well produced. Maybe I have too high of a standard.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

product_meta.title: VoiceBooster Voice Amplifier & Mp3 Player & FM Radio 25watts Black MR-AK38 (Aker) by TK Products,Portable, for Teachers, Coaches, Tour Guides, Presentations, Costumes, Etc.
product_meta.description:
From TK Products, LLC
Model: Aker MR-AK38 
Color: Black 
Peak Power output: 25 Watts 
Frequency response: 100hz ± 13db1khz ± 1db 
Dimensions: 3.74in Diameter x 5.79in Length (95mm x147mm) 
Weight (w/ Batteries): 1.72 lbs (780 g) 
Voltage: 7.5v 
Current consumption: 150mA Speaker Sensitivity: 53 dBV/A +- 3 dB 
Power Source: Built-in Lithium Rechargeable batteries 
Battery Life: 10-15 hours, 6 hour recharge, 2-3 year life (replacements available) 
Also included: Headset microphone, Charger cable (US plug), MP3 cable (male to male 3.5mm), MP3 line in port, Microphone line in port, adjustable waist band, Carry bag. 

Possible Uses: Costumes, Props, Electronic sound effects, MP3 player, Teachers, Professors, Ministers, Coaches, Tour guides, and Presentations. 

Features:
- Built in FM Radio
- USB and MicroSD port for playing MP3 music and sound files
- Rechargeable lithium batteries that last 10-15 hours of continuous use before needing a charge.
- Battery life will last 2-3 years. 
- Sound covers over 6,000 square feet. 
- Comes with adjustable waist or neck band
- Can also be used MP3 speaker. The amp has a microphone input and a MP3 input . The amp will accept signals from both input ports and out through the speaker at the same time.
feature_bullets: Small Super Powerful Voice Amplifier/Speaker Mp3 player & FM Radio. Size is 3.7in diameter x 5.8in length

The VoiceBooster brand is owned by TK Products, LLC. Each VoiceBooster product comes with a 6 month parts and Labor Warranty that is serviced by TK Products, LLC. The VoiceBooster must be purchased through TK Products or one it's authorized dealers for Warranty Claims to be honored.

Rechargeable lithium batteries that last 10-15 hours of continuous use before needing a charge. Battery life will last 2-3 years. Very loud, excellent clarity, low feedback. Sound covers over 7,000 square feet.

USB port and MicroSD Port with controls for playing Mp3 music. Can also be used as a speaker for external Mp3 players. The amp has a microphone input and a MP3 input . The amp will accept signals from both input ports and out through the speaker at the same time. FM Radio with automatic tuning.

Comes with TK Products User Manual, Headset microphone, Charger cable (US plug), MP3 cable (male to male 3.5mm), MP3 line in port, Microphone line in port, USB and MicroSD port, MP3 controls, adjustable waist band, Carry bag.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars99 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
